meanings.definition: A plan or strategy for achieving a particular goal.
meanings.sent1: My teacher gave me a roadmap to follow for my science project.
meanings.sent2: The company's roadmap for success included increasing customer satisfaction.
meanings.sent3: I tried using a roadmap to find my way through the maze, but I still got lost!
meanings.sent4: Her detailed roadmap for organizing the event was like a treasure map leading to success.
meanings.sent5: Following the roadmap carefully, he reached his destination without any detours.

meanings.definition: A visual representation of a planned route or path.
meanings.sent1: The roadmap on the wall showed the best way to get to the park.
meanings.sent2: The GPS displayed a clear roadmap of the upcoming turns on the journey.
meanings.sent3: I drew a silly face on the roadmap to make the trip more entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The roadmap of constellations in the sky guided sailors across the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The roadmap highlighted all the landmarks along the hiking trail for easy navigation.
